title: Install Playwright browser system dependencies
description:
The E2E tests fail to run because Playwright browsers are missing required system libraries.

## Error:
```
chrome-headless-shell: error while loading shared libraries: libatk-1.0.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```

## Root Cause:
Playwright browsers require system libraries that are not installed on the current system. This affects all 10 smoke tests (5 in chromium, 5 in mobile-chrome).

## Solution:
Run `npx playwright install-deps` to install the required system dependencies, or install them manually:
- libatk-1.0.so.0
- Other Chromium dependencies

Alternatively, document this requirement in README or add a setup script.

## Affected Tests:
- All tests in e2e/flows/smoke.spec.ts (currently the only non-skipped tests)

## Files affected:
- frontend/e2e/flows/smoke.spec.ts
- CI pipeline configuration (may need `playwright install-deps` step)

title: BeadsService subprocess lacks timeout and proper error handling
description:
The BeadsService._run_bd_command() method runs subprocess without a timeout, which could cause indefinite hangs if the bd CLI hangs.

Location: /home/mattc/projects/claude-dev-container/backend/app/services/beads.py (lines 22-43)

Issues:
1. No timeout parameter in subprocess.run() - could hang indefinitely
2. No exception handling for subprocess errors (e.g., OSError if bd not found)
3. stderr is captured but never checked or logged on failures

Recommended fixes:
1. Add timeout parameter (e.g., 30 seconds)
2. Wrap in try/except for subprocess errors
3. Log or include stderr in error responses when returncode != 0

title: Security: project_id path traversal vulnerability in API endpoints
description:
The project_id parameter in API endpoints (e.g., /api/projects/{project_id}) is not sanitized for path traversal attacks. An attacker could use '../' sequences to access projects outside the workspace directory.

Affected endpoints:
- GET /api/projects/{project_id}
- GET /api/projects/{project_id}/beads
- POST /api/projects/{project_id}/work/{bead_id}
- POST /api/projects/{project_id}/review
- POST /api/projects/{project_id}/push-pr
- GET /api/projects/{project_id}/progress
- GET /api/projects/{project_id}/attach

Location: /home/mattc/projects/claude-dev-container/backend/app/services/projects.py

The get_project() method directly concatenates project_id with workspace_path without validating:
```python
project_path = workspace / project_id
```

Recommended fix: Validate that resolved path is still within workspace_path after normalization.
close_reason: Added path traversal validation with unit and integration tests
